p:
We quantify the transmission dynamics of the drug sensitive virus samples by estimating the effective reproduction number, R
s , through time. This yields one estimate for each of the 14 RMDS, which agree with one another (depicted by 14 overlapping violin plots per time interval, Fig 3). Our results suggest that R
s was above 2 before 1994, below the epidemic threshold of one between 1994 and 2001 and around 1 after 2001.
